collectionusage: This collection is meant to help users gain knowledge and understanding across various subjects.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with a variety of tasks, including enriching your general knowledge on various topics like history, science, current events, and more.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to explore, ask questions, and deepen your understanding on a multitude of subjects.

usermessages.title: Understanding Climate Change
usermessages.usage: For users interested in understanding the fundamentals of climate change.
usermessages.directive: Explain the basic science behind climate change. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are the primary causes of climate change?

usermessages.title: History of the Renaissance
usermessages.usage: For users who want to delve into the history and impact of the Renaissance period.
usermessages.directive: Describe the key events and figures of the Renaissance. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Who were the most influential artists of the Renaissance?

usermessages.title: Concepts in Modern Physics
usermessages.usage: For users curious about concepts in modern physics like quantum mechanics and relativity.
usermessages.directive: Explain the core concepts of modern physics. Output format: Markdown.

usermessages.title: Current Global Issues
usermessages.usage: For users interested in learning about current global issues affecting the world today.
usermessages.directive: Discuss the major global issues that are currently impacting the world. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are some of the most pressing global issues today?

usermessages.title: Technological Advancements
usermessages.usage: For users interested in technological advancements and their impact on society.
usermessages.directive: Describe recent technological advancements and their societal impacts. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How has artificial intelligence impacted the medical field?
